design_patterns.title: Template Method
design_patterns.description: Ensure a class only has one instance and provide a global point of access to it

design_patterns.title: Iterator
design_patterns.description: Separate the construction of a complex object from its representing so that the same construction process can create different representations

design_patterns.title: Observer
design_patterns.description: Specify the kinds of objects to create using a prototypical instance, and create new objects by copying this prototype

design_patterns.title: Strategy
design_patterns.description: Define an interface for creating an object, but let subclasses decide which class to instantiate. Lets a class defer instantiation to subclasses

design_patterns.title: State
design_patterns.description: Provides an interface for creating families of related or dependent objects without specifying their concrete class.
